Situated amidst the Victorian grandeur of Lord Street, an elegant tree-lined Boulevard in the heart of Southport Merseyside, this hotel offers exquisite accommodation with free Wi-Fi complimented by a centralised location with limited free parking (available on a first come, first served basis) and easy access to all major North West towns and cities. Whether treating themselves to a succulent meal in the on-site restaurant, or taking advantage of the abundance of local shopping and recreational pursuits, guests can expect to receive quality service at an affordable price. options.
Please note, the hotel does not have a lift or ground floor bedrooms.

The Bold Hotel is located on one of the most beautiful boulevards in Britain, forming part of the Lord Street Conservation Area. Indeed, it is often claimed to be the inspiration behind the famous tree-lined boulevards of Paris. The hotel prides itself on retaining the traditional service and atmosphere of its Victorian origins whilst also offering the latest in modern facilities and conveniences with an exemplary commitment to providing a friendly and professional service.

CLASSIC - DOUBLE - Classic Double offers one double bed or two twin beds on request subject to availability. Each of the hotels 23 spacious and tastefully decorated en-suite bedrooms are well equipped with all the modern amenities and creature comforts needed for a relaxing and comfortable stay. This includes complimentary Wi-Fi access, tea/coffee making facilities, TV with freeview, hairdryers and toiletries. Whether business or leisure, a family or a solo traveller, the Bold Hotel offers a wide range of room types including Single, Double, Twin, Triple and Family options.
